title: Competitive Ranked Team Looking for TOP and ADC
body: Hello, We are the JrM, we have 2 ranked teams, we have a core group of 4, currently looking for a substitute ADC who will see a lot of playing time, and need a permanent TOP for us. We use Skype every night, we play every night usually 8 pm to 1 am. We analyze, discuss, don't put people down, focus on winning and ranking up in the ranked ladders. LOOKING FOR PLAYERS RIGHT NOW, THE CORE GROUP IS READY! MESSAGE ME ON LoL! NA SERVER ONLY obviously. My in-game name is JrM Hexum

replies.body:
IGN: Amphilyon
Rank: Gold 4
Role: Top
Availability: Right now any day of the week at any hour!

IGN: Apex661
Rank: Bronze
Role: Jungle
MSG'd! We are down to game RIGHT NOW!

IGN; Solrac Z
Solo Q Rank: Gold 5
Role: Adc
Or leave your IGN, Role and Rank. We are currently in Bronze 2 as a team but are High Silver and Gold individually
